createAddButtonActionListener(JButton) - Method in class presentation.ClientsController
Method that creates the action listener of the addCLient Button This method calls the insertClient method of ClientBll
createAddButtonActionListener(JButton) - Method in class presentation.OrdersController
Method that creates the action listener of the button that creates a new order This method calls a method of productBLL that checks whether the order can be placed (if the amount of products that the client wants order are in stock) If the order can be placed, a new order is created and the stock of products is updated, otherwise a warning understock messages is displayed
createAddButtonActionListener(JButton) - Method in class presentation.ProductsController
Method that creates the action listener of the addProduct Button This method calls the insertProduct method of ProductBll

createBillButtonActionListener(JButton) - Method in class presentation.OrdersController
Method that creates an action listener for the button that generates the bill of given order The order whose bill is generated is selected by ID
